resist poison [poisonres]: 25

(magic-being [magicbeing], inanimate [inanimate], ethereal [ethereal], illusion [illusionary], amphibious [amphibian], need-not-eat [neednoteat], mindless [mind], spirit-sight [spiritsight])

item slots [slots]: head, feet, 2 misc
The phantasmal beast is an illusion of a hideous being. The phantasm is elusive and difficult to hit, but once hit, it will be destroyed. The weapons of a phantasm are unreal and will only harm those who believe them to be real.
